mapper.select: select * from cart where uid=#{uid} order by bno desc
select * from cart where bno=#{bno} and uid=#{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into cart (uid, gno, gname, gcolor, pieces, gimg1 ) values (#{uid}, #{gno}, #{gname}, #{gcolor}, #{pieces} , #{gimg1})
mapper.update: update cart set gno=#{gno}, gcolor=#{gcolor}, pieces=#{pieces}, bdate=(current_date) where bno=#{bno}
